short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension helps you to save path on current webiste

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension helps you to save last used path on any website.
For example if you are reading some blog and finished it on page 3, and next time you want to start from that page, just click Save button. GoTo button - to restore last path. And also clear button - to wipe last saved path data.
Easy and useful.
